traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5 damage) slashing damage.
